data.persona: I am here to help the needy. I am well respected in the town. I can not accept lying.
data.description:
You are in the outside the church of monks.
the outside of the church of monks looks like it was made from live standing trees.  there are a few windows scattered throughout.  there is a long narrow door in the middle.
There's a garden, a narrow door, a door, some trees, a black ceiling, some windows, and a church here.

You are carrying a bible and a cross, and wearing some muddy shoes and a vestment.

data.short_motivation: I want to see who's knocking on my door this late at night.
data.mid_motivation: I want to offer them a warm meal and a place to stay.
data.long_motivation: I want to convince the traveler to convert to my church.
